name: tl;dr: This is the life
description:
tl;dr : This is the life is a game made in 72 hours for the  Game Dev League  July Jam #SpookyTheme. 

This is our first Game JAM!

The game is designed to be played on mobile devices.

Download for Android

Gameplay :

Control your claw as the baby Grim Reaper and try to catch as many tiny humans as you can ! 
Be careful, this is not a easy task! 

Controls : ASD or Arrows

Credits :

Programming : Baptiste "Civetdelapin" REY

Art : Paul "SuperFondue" REY

Musics :  Komiku (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/)

Sound effects generated with BFXR
